Company description: YOKOHAMA Europe is a prominent manufacturer of high-performance tyres, operating as part of the global YOKOHAMA Rubber Group, which has a rich history dating back to 1917. The company is dedicated to advancing its business through its medium-term management plan, Yokohama Transformation 2026 (YX2026), which aims to leverage existing strengths while exploring new value opportunities. YOKOHAMA's ambitious goals include achieving sales revenue of ¥1,150 billion and a business profit margin of 11% by fiscal 2026.  Specializing in a diverse range of products for passenger cars, SUVs, and commercial vehicles, YOKOHAMA Europe is recognized for its innovative tyre lines, such as ADVAN and BluEarth, which prioritize performance, sustainability, and environmental responsibility. The company's mission is to enhance corporate value while maintaining a strong commitment to sustainability, focusing on reducing greenhouse gas emissions and increasing the use of sustainable materials in its products.  YOKOHAMA Europe serves a wide array of clients, including premium car manufacturers and motorsport teams, as well as individual consumers. The company partners with various automotive brands to supply original equipment tyres, targeting a market that values performance, safety, and eco-friendliness. With a strong emphasis on developing products that meet stringent European standards for quality and environmental impact, YOKOHAMA is committed to delivering innovative and environmentally friendly solutions. Through ongoing research and development, YOKOHAMA aims to enhance driving experiences while contributing to a greener future, solidifying its position as a leader in the tyre manufacturing industry.

Company description: Pirelli was founded in Milan in 1872 and today stands as a global brand known for its cutting-edge technology, high-end production excellence and passion for innovation that draws heavily on its Italian roots. With 18 production plants in 12 countries and a commercial presence in over 160, Pirelli has around 30,700 employees and had a turnover of about 5.3 billion euro (in 2021). It is among the world’s major producers of tyres and associated services and the only one focused solely on the Consumer tyre market, which includes tyres for cars, motorcycles and bicycles. Pirelli’s technological excellence is also nourished by the innovation and competencies derived from sporting competitions, in which it has been active for over 110 years. Currently, the Company participates in over 350 car and motorcycle sport events and, since 2011, it has been the exclusive tyre supplier to the Formula 1© World Championship and will be the sole Global Tyre Partner until 2024. All of this has grown from a strong commitment to Research and Development based on an “Open Innovation” model. In 2021, Pirelli’s investment in R&D equaled around 6% of its revenues from High Value products, one of the highest levels among the world’s major tyre producers. Pirelli boasts around 2,000 people engaged in R&D, located at its Milan headquarters and 12 local technology centres, and a portfolio of more than 6,700 patents. The Pirelli brand is an international icon standing for technology, tastefulness and Italian excellence, synonymous with safety and reliability. Represented by the unmistakable “long P” logo for more than a century, the Pirelli name is associated with exclusivity, luxury and innovation, strengthening its distinctive position as a supplier to luxury car manufacturers. Pirelli continually enhances the reputation and strength of the brand through its involvement in motorsport events and competitions, cultural and artistic projects and initiatives benefitting local communities.

Company description: Prometeon Tyre Group is a leading company in the tire industry, specializing in the production of tires for industrial, agricultural, and off-the-road (OTR) applications. The company is committed to innovation and sustainability, aiming to deliver high-performance products that meet the demanding needs of its clients in various sectors, including transportation and motorsport. Prometeon has established strong partnerships with teams in competitive environments, exemplified by its collaboration with the MM Technology team, which recently achieved victory at the Dakar Rally using Prometeon tires. The company’s mission revolves around enhancing tire technology to ensure reliability and performance, particularly in extreme conditions, while its vision focuses on continuous improvement and excellence in product development. With a diverse client base and a commitment to ethical practices, Prometeon Tyre Group is dedicated to providing cutting-edge solutions that support the efficiency and sustainability of fleet management.

Company description: Magazin ist ein innovatives Unternehmen, das sich auf den Verkauf von gut gestalteten Produkten für den Alltag spezialisiert hat. Mit einer klaren Mission, Produkte zu schaffen, die es so nicht gibt oder die bestehende Lösungen verbessern, bietet das Unternehmen eine breite Palette an Artikeln, darunter Möbel, Haushaltswaren und Designobjekte. Die Vision von Magazin ist es, durch kritische Auseinandersetzung mit Materialien und Fertigungsprozessen zur Etablierung einer nachhaltigen Kreislaufwirtschaft beizutragen. Die Zielgruppe umfasst sowohl Privatkunden als auch Fachleute wie Architekten und Inneneinrichter, die auf der Suche nach einzigartigen und funktionalen Designlösungen sind. Magazin arbeitet eng mit verschiedenen Herstellern zusammen, um qualitativ hochwertige Produkte anzubieten, die sowohl ästhetisch ansprechend als auch umweltfreundlich sind. Die physischen Läden in Städten wie Stuttgart, Bonn und München ermöglichen es den Kunden, die Produkte direkt zu erleben und sich inspirieren zu lassen.

Company description: Nokian Tyres plc is a leading tire manufacturer renowned for producing premium tires designed for demanding driving conditions across various vehicle categories, including passenger cars, SUVs, trucks, and heavy machinery. With a strong commitment to safety, sustainability, and performance, the company tailors its products to meet the specific needs of different market areas, ensuring optimal performance for drivers in diverse environments. Nokian Tyres' mission is to enhance driving safety and comfort while minimizing environmental impact, as evidenced by their innovative use of renewable and recycled materials in tire production. The company serves a wide range of clients, from individual drivers seeking high-performance tires to commercial fleets requiring reliable and durable solutions. Nokian Tyres collaborates with partners across the automotive industry and targets markets in the Nordics, Central Europe, and North America, positioning itself as a trusted choice for drivers who prioritize quality and performance in all weather conditions.

Industries: Retail, Motor Vehicle Dealers, Automotive, Wholesale
Company description: Mit der Marke ReifenDirekt ist die Delticom AG das führende Unternehmen in Europa für die Onlinedistribution von Reifen und Kompletträdern. Das Produktportfolio für Privat- und Geschäftskunden umfasst ein beispiellos großes Sortiment aus mehr als 600 Marken und rund 18.000 Reifenmodellen für Pkw und Motorräder. Kompletträder und Felgen komplettieren das Produktangebot.  In 74 Ländern betreibt die Gesellschaft 410 Onlineshops sowie Onlinevertriebsplattformen und betreut darüber mehr als 15,9 Millionen Kunden. Zum Service gehört, dass die bestellten Produkte auf Wunsch des Kunden zur Montage zu einem der weltweit circa 38.000 Werkstattpartner von Delticom geschickt werden können. Das Unternehmen mit Sitz in Hannover, Deutschland, ist vornehmlich in Europa und den USA tätig und besitzt umfassendes Know-how beim Aufbau und Betrieb von Onlineshops, in der Internet-Kundenakquise, in der Internetvermarktung sowie beim Aufbau von Partnernetzwerken. Seit der Gründung 1999 hat Delticom eine umfassende Expertise bei der Gestaltung effizienter und systemseitig voll integrierter Bestell- und Logistikprozesse aufgebaut. Company description: Společnost AAA Auto International, a.s., která provozuje mezinárodní síť autocenter AAA AUTO, se přejmenovala na AURES Holdings, a.s. Přejmenováním chceme vyjádřit širší záběr činnosti skupiny, která se kromě obchodu s ojetými vozy angažuje i v dalších oblastech souvisejících s kompletním řešením mobility. Společnost AAA Auto International, a.s. se dnes již profiluje mnohem komplexněji, než jen na prodej vozů pod značkou AAA AUTO, proto jsme se rozhodli přizpůsobit naší nové podobě náš název a systém našich značek, aby lépe vystihovaly současný stav. První část názvu „AURES“ vychází z anglických slov „Automotive Retail Systems“. To lépe odpovídá celému spektru aktivit, kterým se věnujeme v rámci kompletních řešení mobility zákazníků i firem. Obchod s automobily bude nadále probíhat pod původními značkami, které mají svou tradici a zákazníky. Ti se tak budou i nadále setkávat s ojetými vozy v autocentrech AAA AUTO, zánovními automobily prostřednictvím značek Mototechna a Mototechna Premium, stejně jako s levnými vozy nabízenými pod značkou 1. auto Diskont. Představena byla již inovační laboratoř s názvem AuresLab. V současnosti u nás pracuje více než 2 000 zaměstnanců ve 4 zemích. Jsme silná a dynamická společnost, která oceňuje iniciativu a dobré nápady. Svým zaměstnancům a vedoucím pracovníkům umožňujeme odborný i kariérní rozvoj. Nově vznikající pracovní pozice se snažíme obsadit přednostně našimi kolegy, které během důkladného školení připravíme na jejich nové úkoly. Řada našich současných manažerů u nás i začínala, takže pokud chcete úspěšně nastartovat svou pracovní kariéru, jsme pro Vás tou správnou společností. Další výhodou práce u nás je atraktivita celého odvětví a dobrá perspektiva do budoucnosti. Kvalitní a cenově dostupná ojetá auta budou i nadále velmi žádaná a tím je v AAA AUTO zajištěna stabilita pracovních pozic a nízká fluktuace. Neváhejte a zašlete nám své CV a my uděláme vše pro to, abychom pro Vás v naší společnosti našli místo.

Company description: Med oss på MTR gör du skillnad i människors vardag och för samhället omkring oss. Vi utmanar gamla sanningar och hittar nya lösningar för att utveckla oss själva och de samhällen där vi finns. Det har gjort oss till ett av världens ledande tågbolag. I Sverige driver MTR Stockholms tunnelbana och erbjuder tjänster inom fordonsunderhåll och Facility Management, såsom klottersanering och lokalvård. Vi driver även en Yrkeshögskola med utbildningar för lokförare och tågtekniker. Vi erbjuder många typer av jobb för människor med olika bakgrunder och kompetenser. Hos oss får du variation i arbetet och goda möjligheter att påverka din personliga utveckling och framtid inom företaget.

Company description: Grupo Soledad is a dynamic company specializing in the distribution and retail of tires and spare parts for various vehicles, alongside providing maintenance services through brands like Neumáticos Soledad and Confortauto. Recently, the company expanded its operations by acquiring Aceros y Servicios, a firm based in Puzol, Valencia, that specializes in special steels and produces components for diverse sectors including railways, machinery, and ceramics. This acquisition enhances Grupo Soledad's production capabilities and expertise in special steels, aligning with its mission to optimize processes and generate value for its clients. The company serves a wide range of clients, each a leader in their respective industries, and is committed to sustainability by integrating practices that support the recycling of materials. With a strong focus on innovation and ethical practices, Grupo Soledad aims to contribute positively to society while achieving its business goals.

Company description: NDI Group is a business that is constantly on the move. For more than 50 years, the Kristensen Family’s commitment to become a continuous driving force has ensured that the business has only moved in one direction: forward.  NDI Group is currently the leading supplier of tyres and rims in the Nordic countries. We have a presence in Denmark, Norway, Sweden and Finland. Our own products are recognised and marketed by exclusive dealers in large parts of the world, and the biggest brands are only too happy to be traded by us. ¨ You need to have a decent product range in order to argue that “you keep the customers’ business moving”. And so we have. In fact, we have almost one million tires in stock, and 16 different warehouses throughout the Nordic region. We have manpower and machinery. We have knowhow and a strong work ethic. This means we are able to tailor solutions in an instant when normal standards are not enough.  In other words: We’re moving.  So is it not tempting to lean back and take a little break? No. NDI has the ideas, the muscles and the ambitions to go a lot further. But first and foremost, we have our customers, who hate standstills. Because they mean delays, and delays mean bad business. And it’s the customers we’re here for. We make our living by keeping them moving.

Company description: Vergölst Reifen+Autoservice ist ein etablierter Anbieter von Reifen- und Autoservices in Deutschland, der seit über 90 Jahren tätig ist und Teil der Continental AG ist. Mit einem Netzwerk von über 450 Standorten und rund 1.900 Mitarbeitern sichert das Unternehmen die Mobilität seiner über 3 Millionen zufriedenen Kunden. Vergölst bietet eine breite Palette an Dienstleistungen, darunter Reifenmontage, Achsvermessung, Inspektionen und weitere Autoservices, und richtet sich sowohl an Privatkunden als auch an Flottenmanager. Die Mission des Unternehmens ist es, seinen Partnerbetrieben durch ein modulares Franchise-System umfassende Unterstützung zu bieten, um deren Kerngeschäft nachhaltig und profitabel zu gestalten. Vergölst strebt danach, den langfristigen Erfolg seiner Partner zu sichern und sich kontinuierlich an die sich verändernden Marktbedingungen anzupassen.

Name: Autohaus Rosier GmbH & Co. KG
Locations: [Germany, North Rhine-westphalia, Arnsberg, 8-10 Eickelstraße, 59759], [Germany, Lower Saxony, Wittmund, 2 Industriestraße, 26409], [Germany, Lower Saxony, Wilhelmshaven, 360 Freiligrathstraße, 26386], [Germany, North Rhine-westphalia, Menden], [Germany, Lower Saxony, Friesoythe, 2 Elbestraße, 26169], [Germany, Lower Saxony, Oldenburg, 166-176 Ammerländer Heerstraße, 26129], [Germany, North Rhine-westphalia, Meschede, 37 Im Schwarzen Bruch, 59872], [Germany, Lower Saxony, Westerstede, 48 Kuhlenstraße, 26655]
Industries: Education, Automotive, Consumer Services, Motor Vehicle Dealers
Company description: Autohaus Rosier GmbH & Co. KG ist ein renommiertes Unternehmen, das sich auf den Verkauf und die Vermietung von Fahrzeugen sowie den Handel mit Autozubehör spezialisiert hat. Mit fast 90 Jahren Erfahrung in der Automobilbranche bietet das Unternehmen eine breite Palette an Fahrzeugen, darunter Modelle von namhaften Marken wie Mercedes-Benz, Audi, Volkswagen, Peugeot, smart und Maxus. Die Mission von Autohaus Rosier ist es, seinen Kunden ein umfassendes und qualitativ hochwertiges Einkaufserlebnis zu bieten, während die Vision darin besteht, als führender Anbieter in der Automobilbranche anerkannt zu werden.  Das Unternehmen richtet sich sowohl an Privat- als auch an Geschäftskunden, die Wert auf Qualität und Zuverlässigkeit legen. Besonders hervorzuheben ist die enge Zusammenarbeit mit der Mercedes-Benz Group AG, um sicherzustellen, dass alle Produkte optimal auf die Fahrzeuge abgestimmt sind. Autohaus Rosier bietet nicht nur den Verkauf von Neuwagen und Gebrauchtwagen an, sondern auch umfassende Werkstattleistungen, die durch moderne Werkstätten unterstützt werden.  Ein besonderes Augenmerk liegt auf hochwertigen Reifen und Kompletträdern, insbesondere für Mercedes-Benz Fahrzeuge, wobei Produkte wie der Dunlop SP Winter Sport 4D für ihre hervorragende Leistung unter winterlichen Bedingungen bekannt sind. Das Unternehmen bietet attraktive Rabatte und Aktionen, um seinen Kunden hochwertige Produkte zu wettbewerbsfähigen Preisen anzubieten. Zudem kooperiert Rosier eng mit verschiedenen Automobilclubs und bietet spezielle Programme wie den Mercedes-Benz Reifen- und Komplettradschutz, um die Sicherheit und Zufriedenheit seiner Kunden zu gewährleisten.  Mit Standorten in Nordrhein-Westfalen, Niedersachsen, Sachsen-Anhalt und Schleswig-Holstein ist Autohaus Rosier bestrebt, eine Vielzahl von Kunden durch exzellenten Service und eine große Auswahl an Fahrzeugen zu begeistern.

Company description: Best4Tires steht mit über 40 Jahren Erfahrung in der Reifenbranche für Qualität und Top Lieferservice im Aftersales Markt für Reifen, Felgen und Kompletträder. Mit unserer Leidenschaft für die Anforderungen unserer anspruchsvollen Kunden wollen wir neue Maßstäbe in Kundenorientierung und logistischer Perfektion setzen und so der beste digitale Serviceprovider rund um Reifen werden. Unter unserem Dach führen wir auch die Gundlach Automotive Solutions unsere solide, im Markt eingeführte Marke für die Erstausstattung, welche für eine beeindruckende Entwicklung und Stärke in diesem Markt steht. Wenn es um Reifen, Felgen und damit verbundene Dienstleistungen geht, sind wir eine der ersten Adressen – und unterstreichen unsere seit langem führende Position in Deutschland und Europa, indem etablierte und renommierte Marken unter dem Dach der Best4Tires auch weiterhin Bestand haben. So sind wir mit Best4Tires auf dem besten Weg zum digitalen Full-Service-Provider in unserem Bereich.

Company description: Apollo Tyres Ltd, with its corporate headquarters in Gurgaon, India, is in the business of manufacture and sale of tires since its inception in 1972. Over the years, the company has grown manifold, establishing its footprint across the globe. The company has a manufacturing presence in Asia and Europe with 8 modern tire facilities and exports to over 118 countries. Powered by its key brands — Apollo and Vredestein, the company offers a comprehensive product portfolio spread across passenger car, light truck, truck-bus, off-highway, and bicycle tires, retreading material and retreaded tires. The Vredestein brand is over 100 years old and has achieved premium brand status in the automotive industry, and the Vredestein Head office is located in Amsterdam and a production site in Enschede. Our products include car tyres, tyres for agricultural and industrial applications, and bicycle tyres.

Company description: Established in August 1999, Elit Romania is a member of the Elit & Rhiag Group that was took over in the spring of 2016 by LKQ Corporation. LKQ Corporation is a major distributor for aftermarket spare parts and accessories in North America and the largest distributor of alternative mechanical and collision parts in Europe. With over 18 years of experience on the Romanian market, a network of 35 branches and a team of over 550 employees, Elit Romania offers its customers an extensive range of products and services.  The products portfolio includes more than 200 car parts suppliers,  3 own brands (Starline, XT, Carface) and 7 other brands for which Elit is the only distributor on the Romanian market: UFI, RoadHouse, VAT, RTS, MTS, TAB, ARNOTT.  Among the aftermarket suppliers in Elit portfolio, the most popular are: 	• chassis: BILSTEIN, FAG, ATE, BREMBO, TEXTAR, LEMFÖRDER, SWAG, SACHS, KAYABA 	• filters: MANN, KNECHT, BOSCH 	• engine parts: CONTITECH, VALEO, INA, LUK, ELRING, SACHS, MAHLE, SKF 	• electric: BOSCH, SIEMENS, HELLA, PIERBURG 	• oils: CASTROL, MOBIL, ELF The Truck division provides customers with an offer covering a large assortment of truck parts, represented by a good variety of brands at competitive prices: Textar, Mann Hummel, Febi, Sachs, Covind, Depo, Peters, Diesel Technic, Knorr Bremse, Wabco, Hella, Valeo, Monroe, Blacktech, Contitech, UFI, Knecht, Hengst, Filtron, Donaldson, RoadHouse, LUK, FAG, SKF, Timken, SAF, BPW, CEI, ZF, Bosch. Our newest yet growing division is the garage equipment department. Elit’s offer in this field includes a full range of garage equipment from world well-known manufacturers, but also our own XT brand with a great price-quality rate such as XT TOOLS (pneumatic tools) and XT LIFT (elevators), XT compressor, XT heater. The hand tools category is represented both by professional solutions like the FORCE range and by premium assortments such as the HAZET and KLANN ranges.

Company description: We at AKH Group work with perseverance to assure a safe journey to everyone, every day. Over the past 23 years we have developed our expertise in diverse fields of automotive distribution and services: we offer to our wholesale partners Central Europe’s best product portfolio, availability and best in class logistics – all accessible through our digital B2B portal. We believe that for our retail customers safe journey starts with good quality and well maintained tyres – this quality and consumer focus drives our 10 service centers in Budapest, Hungary and our 100 member partner network in our home country. Our ability to grow and learn fast keeps opening new business horizons and activities. Today we are present in 6 countries of CEE: Hungary, Slovakia, Czech Rep, Slovenia, Croatia and Romania. While our core activity remains passenger car tyre sales we developed truck, industrial and agricultural tyres and lubricants sales and car maintenance. We sell and promote 50 brands from all around the world: we have built strong relationships with Pirelli, Continental, Bridgestone and Michelin and we are proud of having local or regional exclusive ambassador role in Kumho, Falken, Toyo and Nexen tyres, Momo wheels and Castrol lubricants. The continuous learning mindset not only allowed us to develop business but also our people. We offer various carrier paths to our employees from services to sales, from operations to HQ office and vice versa. Your journey is in the heart of all our services, your car is in good hands.  To learn more about AKH’s (Abroncs Kereskedőház Kft.) services visit akh.hu. To check our products and services visit gumi.hu. To join our team visit akh.hu/karrier.

Company description: Tokić Ltd is the authorized importer and distributor of more than 300 worldwide recognized producers of car parts and additional equipment for the automobile industry. Together with Barog in Slovenia and franchising partners, Tokić d.o.o. is the largest car spare parts retail chain in region with more than 140 retail outlets throughout Croatia and Slovenia. Tokić Ltd offers more than 300,000 different articles: bodies parts, engines, gear sticks and transmissions, steering and suspension, braking systems, exhaust systems, auto electrics, lubricants and special liquids, auto cosmetics and auto protection, as well as tools, additional and compulsory equipment, heavy duty spare parts, motorcycle assortment, industrial program, or even chargers for electric and hybrid vehicles. After Bartog acquisition Tokić is also mayor player on tyre market for vehicles from bike's and cycles to cars, trucks and agricultural machines.  All producers represented by Tokić Ltd meet the highest international standards of quality and safety (ISO 9000, ISO 14000, ISO/TS/16949, etc.), and most produce original installation equipment. For export contact us: export@tokic.hr

Company description: Concessionaria Ufficiale Mercedes-Benz, Smart, Subaru, Fuso e Unimog Sei alla ricerca di un’auto in vendita online? Affidati ad una Concessionaria Ufficiale e scopri, tra tutte le nostre offerte auto Mercedes-Benz, smart e Subaru, quella che più fa per te. Scegli tra le tantissime auto nuove, auto usate, auto km 0 e auto aziendali disponibili e in pronta consegna. Siamo anche concessionari ufficiali di veicoli commerciali Mercedes-Benz, veicoli industriali Mercedes-Benz, Unimog e Mitsubishi Fuso. Scopri i nostri veicoli commerciali usati e i veicoli industriali usati. Trova le migliori offerte di noleggio a lungo termine Mercedes-Benz e smart. Carraro è anche sinonimo di assistenza post-vendita con varie officine autorizzate Mercedes, smart e Subaru in Veneto e Friuli Venezia Giulia. Cosa potrai fare? Tagliando, ricambi originali, manutenzione straordinaria e lavori di carrozzeria oltre alla sostituzione dei tuoi pneumatici estivi ed invernali. Hai bisogno di un’auto o di un furgone per qualche giorno? Scopri il nostro servizio di noleggio a breve termine CarraroRent con più di 100 veicoli. Vieni a trovarci in una delle nostre 11 sedi Carraro. Ci trovi a Susegana (TV), Nervesa della Battaglia (TV), Sedico (BL), Treviso, Castelfranco Veneto (TV), Mestre (VE), Santa Maria di Sala (VE), Pordenone (PN) e Pradamano (UD). Le nostre sedi sono facilmente raggiungibili anche da Padova, Pordenone, Udine, Trento, Bolzano, Vicenza e Rovigo. Ti aspettiamo.

Company description: Werthenbach - Technischer Handel is a specialized trading company dedicated to the distribution of technical products and solutions tailored for the industrial and maintenance sectors. The company offers a comprehensive range of products, including hydraulic and pneumatic components, sealing and filtration technology, drive technology, and personal protective equipment. Serving a diverse clientele across various industries such as mechanical engineering, agriculture, and construction, Werthenbach is committed to delivering high-quality products and exceptional service that add value to its customers.  With a mission centered on customer satisfaction, Werthenbach aims to provide seamless access to essential technical supplies while ensuring a strong focus on service excellence and responsiveness. The company operates in 54 countries, leveraging international trade relationships to enhance its market reach. Each customer is assigned a personal contact who addresses their specific needs, emphasizing Werthenbach's commitment to individualized customer care.  Additionally, the company boasts an extensive online shop featuring over 270,000 orderable items, making it a convenient option for clients seeking efficiency and variety in their procurement processes. Recognized for its operational efficiency and security in international trade, Werthenbach holds an AEO certification for export. With a dedicated team fluent in both English and German, the company ensures effective communication and support for its international partners and clients, reinforcing its position as a reliable provider of technical solutions in the global market.

Name: Regionalverkehr Köln GmbH
Locations: [Germany, North Rhine-westphalia, Hürth, 262 Bonnstraße, 50354], [Germany, North Rhine-westphalia, Euskirchen, 2a Oststraße, 53879], [Germany, North Rhine-westphalia, Bornheim, 8 Allerstraße, 53332], [Germany, North Rhine-westphalia, Bergisch Gladbach, 48a Hermann-löns Straße, 51469], [Germany, North Rhine-westphalia, Wermelskirchen, 1 Braunsberger Straße, 42929], [Germany, North Rhine-westphalia, Köln], [Germany, North Rhine-westphalia, Meckenheim, 1 Kalkofenstraße, 53340]
Technologies: Apache, jQuery, Genesis Framework, Genesis theme, oEmbed, Borlabs Cookie, MySQL, jQuery Migrate, PHP, UNIX, Apache HTTP Server, Email Encoder for Wordpress, WordPress, Priority Hints, RSS
Company description: Die Regionalverkehr Köln GmbH (RVK) ist ein modernes Verkehrsunternehmen, das sich der umweltschonenden und nachhaltigen Mobilität im Rheinland verschrieben hat. Mit über 960 Mitarbeitern befördert die RVK jährlich mehr als 24 Millionen Fahrgäste sicher und zuverlässig in ihrem Kernverkehrsgebiet, das sich über den Kreis Euskirchen, den Rheinisch-Bergischen Kreis und den Rhein-Sieg-Kreis erstreckt, sowie in den Städten Köln, Bonn, Leverkusen, Hürth, Brühl und Wesseling. Das Unternehmen betreibt ein umfangreiches Liniennetz mit 132 Linien und einer Gesamtlänge von 2.595 Kilometern, wobei sowohl eigene Linien als auch Aufträge für andere Verkehrsunternehmen bedient werden.  Die RVK verfolgt das Ziel, durch innovative und moderne Verkehrslösungen die Mobilität der rund zwei Millionen Einwohner in der Region zu fördern und gleichzeitig höchste technische Standards einzuhalten. Ein zentraler Aspekt der Unternehmensmission ist die Förderung umweltfreundlicher Reisemöglichkeiten, wobei der Einsatz von Wasserstoffbussen zur Reduzierung von Emissionen eine wichtige Rolle spielt. Die RVK bedient eine vielfältige Klientel, darunter lokale Bewohner, Touristen und Freizeitbegeisterte, und verbindet sie mit wichtigen Zielen wie Parks, Erholungsgebieten und kulturellen Stätten. Darüber hinaus arbeitet die RVK aktiv mit verschiedenen Partnern zusammen, um die regionale Mobilität zu verbessern und Gemeinschaftsinitiativen zu unterstützen, wodurch sichergestellt wird, dass der öffentliche Nahverkehr für alle Nutzer zugänglich und zuverlässig ist. Durch ihr Engagement für Nachhaltigkeit und Kundenservice strebt die Regionalverkehr Köln GmbH danach, zu einer grüneren Zukunft beizutragen und gleichzeitig ein starkes Gemeinschaftsgefühl in den bedienten Regionen zu fördern.

Volvo började producera sina första bilar 1927 och samma år tecknade vi vårt första kontrakt med Volvo gällande försäljning och service. Detta gör oss idag inte bara till Sveriges, utan världens äldsta Volvohandlare. Vi hjälper och underlättar vardagen för våra kunder genom att vara en fullserviceanläggning. Det innebär att förutom att köpa sin nya Volvo, Polestar, Lynk & Co, Fiat,  Alfa Romeo, Jeep, Abarth, ORA, eller begagnade bil hos oss hjälper vi dig även med service, reparationer, skadebesiktning, bilvård, däck & däckhotell, reservdelar, tillbehör, hyrbil m.m. På vår hemsida kan du enkelt komma i kontakt med oss både via mail och telefon samt enkelt boka tid för service, hjulskifte, skadebesiktning, kontroll av stenskott m.m.  Välkommen att besöka oss i Helsingborg, Höganäs eller Landskrona.

Company description: Euromaster España es una empresa especializada en neumáticos y mecánica rápida, operando desde 1963. Con más de 500 centros de servicio y 2000 unidades móviles, la compañía se dedica a ofrecer soluciones integrales para todo tipo de vehículos, incluyendo turismos, furgonetas, camiones, remolques, tractores y maquinaria de ingeniería civil. Su misión es proporcionar un servicio de alta calidad y seguridad, ayudando a sus clientes a gestionar sus flotas de manera eficiente y optimizando sus presupuestos de mantenimiento. Euromaster trabaja en estrecha colaboración con grandes marcas de neumáticos y cuenta con un equipo de más de 650 expertos y 2000 técnicos a disposición de sus clientes. Su enfoque abarca tanto a clientes particulares como a profesionales, asegurando que todos reciban el mejor asesoramiento y atención en sus necesidades automotrices.

Company description: Oduvijek s vama.  Više od 70 godina smo jedna od vodećih kompanija u segmentu prodaje i održavanja osobnih i gospodarskih vozila. Naše temeljne vrijednosti su tradicija, pouzdanost, kvaliteta i dugoročna vrijednost jer nije stvar samo u vozilima, stvar je u pričama koje pišemo zajedno. Poslovna grupa Auto Hrvatska partnerima i klijentima pruža sveobuhvatne usluge u automobilskoj industriji. Uz svjetski poznate marke osobnih i gospodarskih vozila, nudimo bogatu ponudu rezervnih dijelova, guma, opreme, servisne opreme i alata poznatih proizvođača te ostale usluge u auto struci. MISIJA  Naši izvrsni djelatnici pružaju prvoklasna rješenja korisnicima za nabavu širokog spektra vozila i prateće opreme i njihovog održavanja uz društveno odgovorno poslovanje i zaštitu okoliša.  VIZIJA  Biti sinonim za kompetenciju i konkurentnost na tržištu proizvoda i usluga auto struke.  With you all along.  For more than 70 years, we have been one of the leading companies in the segment of sales and maintenance of automotive and commercial vehicles. Our core values are tradition, reliability, quality and long-term value because it is not just about vehicles, it is about the stories we create together. The Auto Hrvatska business group provides partners and clients with comprehensive services in the automotive industry. In addition to world-famous brands of automotive and commercial vehicles, we offer a wide range of spare parts, tires, equipment, service equipment and tools from well-known manufacturers, as well as other services in the automotive industry. MISSION  Our excellent employees provide first-class solutions to users for the purchase of a wide range of vehicles and related equipment and their maintenance, while maintaining social responsibility and protecting the environment.  VISION  To be synonymous with competence and competitiveness in the market of automotive products and services.

Name: THERMOPLAY Molding Solutions

Technologies: SOX, Ai, Autodesk, Assembly, R, adjust
Company description: Thermoplay is specialised in developing and manufacturing hot runner systems for plastic injection moulding. Thanks to constant growth and considerable investments, Thermoplay has achieved leading position in Italy and throughout the world. Headquarter and manufacturing plant is located in the industrial area of Pont-Saint-Martin in Aosta, Italy. Thermoplay is present with sales and technical team in 48 countries worldwide.  The product range includes a vast selection of standard and special hot runner systems, complete hot halves as well as temperature and sequential control units, flow analysis, customized projects, simultaneous injection of different colours and materials, sequential injection with pneumatic or hydraulic valves, in order to satisfy all type of configuration needs for any market or application.

Company description: Bilia är en av Europas största helhetsleverantörer för allt som rör bilägandet med en ledande position inom service och försäljning av personbilar, transportbilar och lastbilar. Vi erbjuder service och reparationer, drivmedel, biltvätt, hyrbilar, däck och fälg, fälgrenovering, biltillbehör, bilvård, lackering, glasbyten och bildemontering med mera. Bilia har cirka 170 anläggningar i Sverige, Norge, Luxemburg och Belgien samt en auktionssajt i Sverige.    Bilias Serviceaffär omfattar ett väl utvecklat sortiment av tjänster och servicekoncept som utvecklas kontinuerligt för att förenkla bilägandet för kunderna. Bilia erbjuder tillbehör och reservdelar, originalservice och reparationer, däckhotell, fälgrenovering, bilglasreparationer och andra verkstadstjänster, butiksförsäljning och e-handel.    Bilias Bilaffär omfattar försäljning av nya och begagnade person-, transport- och lastbilar samt tilläggstjänster såsom finansiering och försäkring. Bilia säljer personbilar av märkena Volvo, BMW, MINI, Toyota, Lexus, Mercedes-Benz, Porsche, Volkswagen, Audi, Skoda, Seat, Cupra, Nissan, Jaguar, Range Rover, Defender, Discovery och XPENG samt transportbilar av märkena Toyota, Mercedes-Benz, Volkswagen och Nissan och lastbilar av märket Mercedes-Benz.    Bilias Drivmedelsaffär omfattar försäljning av drivmedel och biltvätt i Sverige.

Company description: OUR VISION : Guarantee the overall quality, in respect of the environment and our ethical values, focusing on training, research & development and technology, to become “THE” trusted partner for our customers. OUR COMPANY : Italian Gasket was founded in 1984. It produces technical rubber items not only o-ring (nearly more than 500 million of pieces) such as grommets, filters, muffs, caps, fairleads, pipettes, little stoppers, frames, bellows, o-rings, frames, car safety parts, car interior parts, silicone connectors, electronic devices, suction cups, membranes, high tech sealings which are produced with any kind of elastomer. In 40 years Italian Gasket has opened extra BU in Italy for TOOLS and PLASTIC and in HUNGARY for the rubber product manufacturing in order to give a better and more complete service to the customer.   Italian Gasket supplies markets whit high standard needs:  besides the main automotive sector it supplies also the pneumatic, home appliance, lighting, electronics, heating, oil & gas, and medical.  The technical service is guaranteed by a skilled and professional team and optimized by the use of Cad/Cam systems. The inner proces on development and construction guarantee speed and flexibility.

Company description: KABAT TYRE to polski producent opon rolniczych, przemysłowych oraz opon pełnych do wózków widłowych, dętek, ochraniaczy, profili gumowych, mieszanek gumowych oraz szeroko pojętych technicznych wyrobów z gumy. Firma Kabat została założona w 1983 roku i od początku swojego istnienia jest ona biznesem rodzinnym. Właścicielem firmy jest Andrzej Kabat. Obecnie firma Kabat Tyre eksportuje swoje produkty do 80 krajów na całym świecie od Europy, po Amerykę, Azję aż po Afrykę. W ofercie firmy znajduje się ponad 70 indeksów w wielu rozmiarach, takie jak małe typu implement, ogrodowe, implement, do traktorów przednie i napędowe, do upraw międzyrzędowych, przemysłowe i rolniczo-przemysłowe. Wiele z tych opon trafia na pierwszy montaż do polskich i zagranicznych producentów sprzętu rolniczego.

With a mission focused on delivering personalized consulting and customized solutions, the company aims to build long-term relationships based on trust and collaboration. Ciavarella offers a wide range of tires from premium to budget brands, catering to various vehicles including cars, trucks, motorcycles, and agricultural machinery. The company prides itself on its efficient logistics network, ensuring rapid delivery across central and southern Italy, and maintains strong partnerships with major tire manufacturers, promoting successful affiliate programs. Additionally, Ciavarella Pneumatici emphasizes continuous training for its staff and clients, ensuring they stay updated with the latest industry advancements while also providing comprehensive tire disposal services.

The company recently expanded its offerings by acquiring the pneumatic business unit of Univer S.p.A., marking a significant step in its growth strategy and enhancing its product portfolio. Company description: Founded in 1958, our family business is managed in close cooperation by the second and third generation of the Goedert family. Our DNA is to support individual and professional people in their daily mobility as a trusted actor in order to provide them with absolute comfort and serenity on all their journeys.  Today, the Goedert Group has more than 180 employees spread over various sites and represents a group with diversified activities, consisting of several entities present on a total of 9 sites on the territory of the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg. The Goedert Group is present in the automotive sector with a network of 9 centers :   - Automotive trade activities (accessories and automotive maintenance products)  - Automotive workshop (maintenance, repair and overhaul services)  - Car wash  - Gas stations In a constant effort to better serve its customers, Autocenter Goedert is expanding and is now affiliated with the Bosch Car Service network of garages, which offers our technicians assistance and continuous training, as well as privileged access to technical data and Bosch tools to ensure the best vehicle maintenance. The group is also present in the soft mobility field with the Goedert Velocenter : cycle shop, assembly and repair workshop, sales of accessories and other services. Goedert has 2 local grocery shops offering local, regional, fresh, organic and gluten-free products as well as basic necessities. Freshly made sandwiches are prepared daily in Hollerich with a catering and bakery corner "Op der Pompel".

Company description: Euromaster AB är en del av Michelinkoncernen och Europas största däckkedja – med över 2800 verkstäder i 17 länder. Vi är specialister på däck- och fordonsservice och hjälper både privatpersoner och företag med trygga och hållbara transportlösningar.  I Sverige har vi 130 verkstäder på över 100 orter, där våra dedikerade medarbetare står redo att ge personlig service, med stöd av erfarenheten och kompetensen från hela vårt europeiska nätverk. Det gör oss till en stark och pålitlig partner för allt som rullar – på vägar, åkrar, byggarbetsplatser och andra miljöer där fordon verkar.  Vi arbetar aktivt för att minska våra kunders miljöpåverkan och kostnader, med smarta produkter och tjänster som främjar ett mer hållbart transportsystem.  Vi erbjuder ett heltäckande produkt-, tjänst- och serviceerbjudande inom däck och fordonsservice för företag och privatpersoner för alla typer av fordon. Huvudkontoret ligger i Varberg.

Company description: El Grupo Lekuona, con más de 50 años de experiencia, es un referente en el sector industrial, ofreciendo soluciones integrales que abarcan desde la ingeniería de desarrollo de sistemas hidráulicos y neumáticos, la fabricación de componentes mediante mecanizado, corte láser, calderería y pintura, hasta la gestión, integración, logística y montaje, garantizando la máxima eficiencia en cada etapa del proceso. Company description: Örum Oy Ab serves automotive aftermarket in spare parts, accessories, equipment and lubricants with professional attitude in Finland. We are a supplier and wholesaler of high quality OE products and spare parts from Europe’s leading automotive manufacturers and suppliers.  We help our customers to grow up their business by providing also technical service and concepts, functional logistic, high quality products and highly professional service.  For heavy duty garages we provide OE quality spare parts and work lights.  For Finnish trailer manufacturers and forest machine industry we provide pneumatic brake systems and heavy duty lighting.  Örum owns two chain brands, Autoasi and Autonomi garage chains. There are approximately 250 privately owned car repair shops in Finland in our consept chains. We are also accredited spare part provider for Bosch Car Service chain in Finland.   Products we represent are also available from well-equipped spare part retailers and tire chains. Örum was established in 1923 and it is still in 100% Finnish ownership. Örum Group’s subsidiaries are Diagno Finland Oy and Turvata Oy Ab in Finland, and Mercantile AS in Estonia. Company description: Anche se due automobili appaiono identiche, può esistere fra di loro una profonda differenza: il marchio di chi le ha vendute. Dietro a quel marchio c’è un insieme di valori che per il cliente rappresentano un sicuro punto di riferimento: esperienza, professionalità, convenienza. Abbiamo acquisito da Toyota e da Citroën un’idea forte e chiara: non accontentarsi mai ma considerare ogni punto di arrivo come una ripartenza verso il miglioramento continuo. Con questo spirito siamo cresciuti in dimensione, anno dopo anno, ma soprattutto siamo cresciuti nella stima e nella soddisfazione dei nostri clienti. Così abbiamo dato ai nostri marchi prestigiosi e dinamici e ai suoi clienti, una “casa” all’altezza delle sfide che il mondo dell’automobile ci vorrà porre. Noi di Automaster® partecipiamo con entusiasmo a questa sfida per la parte che ci compete. Ecco perché ci impegniamo costantemente alla ricerca delle migliori condizioni commerciali e finanziarie per i nostri Clienti, perché abbiamo attivato lo sportello assicurativo con assistenza gratuita in caso di incidente, perché abbiamo installato la linea di manutenzione Duotec Toyota che esegue tagliandi accurati in meno di un’ora, il servizio pneumatici, l’apertura della carrozzeria (2009). Tutto questo ci ha fatto ottenere la prestigiosa Certificazione internazionale di Qualità TUV. La nostra missione Noi di Automaster® abbiamo deciso di essere molto esigenti. Innanzitutto con noi stessi. La nostra mission risulta, quindi, molto semplice: vogliamo che i nostri clienti siano in tutto e per tutto completamente soddisfatti. Niente di più e niente di meno. Questa è la miglior garanzia che il nostro lavoro verrà apprezzato sempre di più e da un numero sempre crescente di clienti. E non solo nel momento dell’acquisto, ma anche e soprattutto quando il cliente è alla guida. Un grande impegno quotidiano, quindi, perché noi vinciamo solo quando vincono i nostri Clienti.

Company description: Vi hjælper dig dér, hvor du har brug for det. Vi er lokale og vi er landsdækkende. Vi arbejder hver dag for at holde dine hjul i gang. Mere effektivt. Mere bæredygtigt. Mere sikkert. Mere ansvarligt. Vi står aldrig stille hos Dækpartner. Vi hjælper dig hele vejen med rådgivning, service og produkter, der matcher. Og det er ikke uden grund, at vi ser os selv som en af erhvervslivets store servicepartnere. Til det hører at sende biler, vogne og lastbiler afsted på de rigtige dæk, med det rigtige mønster og det rigtige dæktryk til den rigtige pris. I Dækpartner er det mennesker, engagement og arbejdsglæde, som skaber resultater. Det har indtil videre gjort os til Europamestre i medarbejdertilfredshed – og det er en vigtig forudsætning for vores mål: At have Danmarks mest tilfredse kunder og levere kundeoplevelser, der er i en klasse for sig. Dækpartner er 100% danskejet af Vulkan Group og forhandler dæk og fælge fra markedets bedste leverandører.  Dét forpligter alle de steder, vi er.

Company description: Euromaster Nederland is een toonaangevende specialist in banden en onderhoud, actief sinds 1991. Het bedrijf biedt een breed scala aan diensten, waaronder bandenreparatie, vervanging en onderhoud voor diverse voertuigtypes zoals personenwagens, bestelwagens, vrachtwagens, landbouw- en grondverzetvoertuigen. Met een focus op duurzaamheid en maatschappelijk verantwoord ondernemen, streeft Euromaster ernaar om waar mogelijk reparatie boven vervanging te verkiezen, wat bijdraagt aan het verlengen van de levensduur van banden en het behalen van MVO-doelstellingen. De organisatie bedient een diverse klantenkring, van particuliere autobezitters tot bedrijven met uitgebreide wagenparken, en werkt samen met meer dan 450 monteurs en 150 mobiele units om optimale service te bieden. Euromaster is niet alleen een partner in mobiliteit, maar ook een expert die klanten helpt bij het maken van de beste keuzes voor hun voertuigen en bedrijfsvoering.

Company description: A MyForce é a marca da Rede de Oficinas da Número Um – Reparação Automóvel SA, pertencente ao Grupo TopChallenge. A MyForce é a maior rede nacional de oficinas próprias, com mais de 90 oficinas e líder em gestora de frotas.  Na MyForce, cuidamos de todos os aspectos da manutenção do seu carro, desde a simples mudanças de óleo até revisões completas, passando por pneus, travões, amortecedores e até mesmo inspeções e muito mais. A nossa equipa altamente especializada está equipada com tecnologia de ponta, capaz de lidar com todo o tipo de veículos, incluindo os híbridos e elétricos, utilizando peças homologadas pelos principais fabricantes automóveis. Criamos o Sistema Integrado de Saúde Automóvel, com mais de 88 oficinas "clínicas",  3 oficinas "hospital" de mecânica especializada para intervenções mais complexas, e ainda uma Linha de Saúde Auto dedicada a oferecer apoio e assistência ao seu veículo. Somos uma história de sucesso: mais de 95% de clientes satisfeitos, e vários prémios ganhos em 2023, 2024 e 2025 (prémio 5 estrelas, Marca Recomendada e Boa Escolha).  Na MyForce, estamos em constante evolução para garantir uma experiência ainda mais personalizada e tecnologicamente avançada. Com o lançamento do Clube MyForce e da nova Área de Cliente MyForce, oferecemos acesso exclusivo ao histórico de diagnósticos do seu veículo, além de fotos e faturas para uma transparência total. Evoluímos na proximidade, evoluímos para MyForce e continuamos a ser o futuro da reparação automóvel, mas agora mais próximos. MyForce o futuro da reparação automóvel

Company description: EMA S.A is one of the leading companies in the distribution of Tyres and Lubricants for the Greek market, with a 40+ million Turnover that employs 60 people, with HQ in Athens and warehouses in Athens and Thessaloniki. The company operates in two business units, the Tyre business, and the Lubricant business. EMA is the exclusive distributor of the brands of Continental AG (Continental, Uniroyal, Barum, Viking & General Tire) and Kumho Tyre. In the lubricant business, EMA is distributing in the Greek market the BP group brands (Castrol & Aral), Liqui Moly, and 77Lubricants.

The range of products, initially conceived for applications on industrial machineries, was quickly  extended with solutions for domestic heating (towel rails and radiators) and also in the end with the introduction of PTC heaters, micro-tubular heaters, nozzle band heaters, thermocouples, thermometers and domestic and industrial temperature regulators.

Name: MARSO Kft
Technologies: WordPress, Facebook Pixel, Cloudflare CDN, CloudFlare, React, Google Tag Manager, Cloudflare Web Optimizations, Google Analytics, Cloudflare Browser Insights, Bolt CMS, PHP, Microsoft 365, JSON-LD, X-Content-Type-Options, X-XSS-Protection, Nginx, Bolt
Company description: MARSO Ltd. was founded in 1990. Today the firm has grown to be the leader wholesaler of the Hungarian tyre market. Marso created a nation-wide service station network in 14 locations in Hungary.  The headquarter is situated in Nyíregyháza, Hungary. MARSO owns import rights for the following brands: Nokian (exclusive), Matador (exclusive), BKT (exclusive), Barum, Dneproshina, Mitas, Rosava, Voltyre. MARSO and the Ukrainian Kremenchug Wheel Plant co-founded Trans Wheels & Tyres in 1995 for distributing passenger, truck and agricultural wheels in Western-Europe. In order to further strengthen its leading position, MARSO started to build a nationwide distribution network. The Marso Partner Network began to take shape, which covered the rest of the Hungarian tire and wheel market between the regional bases. In 2001 Continental Hungary and Marso together with a third party co-founded the Pneus Expert Network dealing with Barum tyres. Marso opened its first foreign distribution and logistical center in Tg. Mureş, Romania called MARSOROM in 2003. Today MARSOROM has 7 service outlets in Romania. In 2004 Marso constructed a Bandag retreading factory in Nyíregyháza, Hungary. Being the largest Hungarian tyre- and wheel wholesale and retail network, Marso looks ahead for further expansion in the Central-European region in the future.

Name: S. José Pneus
Company description: S. José Pneus is a leading company in the distribution of tires in Portugal and Spain, with over 57 years of experience in the industry. Founded by the Aniceto family, the company has evolved through three generations, maintaining a strong commitment to continuous improvement and customer satisfaction. Its mission is to provide high-quality tire solutions while enhancing the customer experience through innovative digital platforms and accessible information. S. José Pneus serves a diverse clientele, including individual consumers and businesses, and collaborates with various partners to expand its offerings. The company is also dedicated to community development, exemplified by initiatives like the Bolsa de Mérito, which supports education for underprivileged youth in the region. With a focus on quality and service, S. José Pneus aims to solidify its position as a reference in the tire distribution sector.

Company description: Brimborg is a car and van importer and dealership for Volvo Cars, Ford, Mazda, Citroën, Peugeot, Opel, Polestar. Brimborg also represents Volvo trucks, Volvo Bus, Volvo Construction Equipment and Volvo Penta marine engines as well as Dieci telehandlers, Hiab trucks cranes and Reisch trailers. Brimborg offers for sale new and used cars, vans, trucks and equipment and service and parts for it´s brands. Brimborg is an importer, retailer and installer of AC charging and DC fast charging equipment for homes and businesses and is also operating it´s own public fast charging network under brand name Bílorka. Brimborg is the independent licensee for Dollar Rent A Car and Thrifty Car Rental in Iceland. MAX1 chain of quick fit workshops in Great Reykjavik area owned by Brimborg is servicing all automotive brands in Iceland for tyres from Nokian, brake repairs, lubrication, car batteries, shock absorbers, wiper blades from Trico, washer fluids and bulbs. Vélaland is Brimborg´s non-authorised chain of workshops offering complete service for all automotive brands in Iceland.

Company description: ESTRIMA was established in Pordenone in 2009, with the mission to design, manufacture and distribute the smallest electric vehicle with 4 wheels and 2 seats. The outcome is Birò, a made in Italy electric "minicar" with small dimensions and great performance. DRIVE SMALL, THINK BIG  Birò enables you to travel freely in the restricted traffic zones of many cities and park easily in scooter spaces. There are so many advantages to a personal commuter that is small, practical and intelligent. FULL PROTECTION You’re well protected from the rain, cold and wind in the colder seasons. It's also perfect to keep the social distancing because it's completely closed, although the roof and the hardened back windscreen can be opened, and the polycarbonate doors are removable to let in light and air in the hotter seasons. OPEN MINDED Birò works with a keyless system that opens the driver’s side door and starts the engine, which is activated by the Birò App. SPACE FOR SAFETY Birò is fitted with 4 disk brakes, 175 width rear tyres, and its frame is manufactured in 3mm steel tubing to make the cabin as strong and resistant as possible. On top of this, two round structures in thick, high-density ABS plastic guarantee high shock absorption.  ELECTRIC ECLECTIC Four agile wheels and two 100% electric brushless motors, mounted on the two back wheels, with no transmission system, thereby eliminating additional weight and cutting maintenance costs.  TOTAL VISION Birò has a cabin with wide and transparent surfaces which offer you complete 345-degree views, which are guaranteed in any condition by the defrost grid windscreen.   EASY MOVE AND RE-MOVE  Once your Birò is parked, it is easy to remove the battery unit and take it to your house, or your office, or wherever is most convenient. So you can recharge it wherever there be a 220v socket!

Company description: Meccanocar fornisce attrezzature, utensili e accessori professionali per i settori automotive (assistenza e riparazione), truck, artigianato e industria.  Negli anni l'azienda ha perseguito questo sogno con passione, costanza e determinazione, focalizzando lo sviluppo sulla continua innovazione tecnologica in funzione dei cambiamenti del mercato e delle sue esigenze.  Meccanocar pone al centro ogni cliente per offrirgli gli strumenti necessari al fine di migliorare la competitività e la qualità del suo lavoro.  Il marchio Meccanocar è conosciuto ed affermato a livello nazionale ed internazionale. In Europa siamo presenti con due filiali, Meccanocar Italia e Meccanocar France, oltre ad una rete di distributori ufficiali ed esclusivi. L'offerta di prodotto Meccanocar:  - Prodotti chimici - Minuteria metallica e viteria - Minuteria elettrica - Taglio, foratura ed abrasivi - Fissaggio generico e specifico - Materiale di consumo  - Climatizzazione auto, cargo e civile - Attrezzatura manuale - Utensileria elettrica e pneumatica - Arredamento officina e allestimento furgoni - Antinfortunistica - Molletteria auto, tergicristallo e tappeti auto - Cargo - Servizio pneumatici - Saldatura - Ricambi truck - Abbigliamento - Articoli pubblicitari

Name: Berlin Tyres Europa GmbH
Company description: BERLIN TYRES EUROPA GmbH ist die neue Vertriebsgesellschaft in Berlin für vier Unternehmen der Reifen- und Felgenbranche. Wir sorgen für effiziente und erfolgreiche Vermarktungsmöglichkeiten für unserer Marken, entwickeln kurz- und langfristige Strategien, um für die Herausforderungen eines schnell wachsenden europäischen Marktes optimal aufgestellt zu sein. Wichtig ist für uns die Schärfung des individuellen Markenprofils und die Stärkung seiner Markenpositionierung. Gleichzeitig nutzen wir die Synergien, die durch eine zentrale Vertriebsgesellschaft entstehen. Mit einer über 30-jährigen Produkterfahrung wurden die betrieblichen Abläufe, Geschäftsprozesse und Strukturen optimiert. Das moderne Lagermanagement, die Logistik sowie die Administration sind am Standort Frankenthal in der Pfalz zu finden. Ein Mix aus Qualität und Erfahrung der Mitarbeiter sowie innovative Prozesse zeichnen unsere Unternehmensstruktur aus.

Technologies: Office 365 Mail, Afterpay, R, Sales Representative, Google Workspace, Site Kit, MailChimp, LiteSpeed, WP Rocket, Cart Functionality, oEmbed, Underscore.js, jQuery Migrate, HTTP/3, Facebook Chat Plugin, Slick, Litespeed Cache, Debian, Google Ads Conversion Tracking, Apache HTTP Server, Shopify, reCAPTCHA, Google Analytics, Font Awesome, Yoast SEO, Google Tag Manager, Destinet, jQuery, Mailgun, Hotjar, WordPress, Priority Hints, X-Content-Type-Options, Facebook Pixel, RSS, Open Graph, AppNexus, Facebook, X-XSS-Protection, Smartlook, WooCommerce, Apache, MailChimp for WooCommerce, PixelYourSite, Google Ads, JSON-LD, Microsoft 365, Bootstrap, PHP, TablePress, Google Fonts API, Google Maps, Trident AB, HSTS, Linkedin Insight Tag, MySQL, Nginx, Lightbox, ClickCease, Google Font API
Company description: Dekk1 skal være en norsk, frittstående, uavhengig dekk-kjede. Vi skal selge kvalitetsdekk og felger av kjente og ledende merker. Dekk1 skal være en faghandel kjede, og skal differensiere seg i markedet ved, fagkunnskap, vareutvalg service og profil. Vårt mål er å være Norges største og ledende uavhengige dekk-kjede. Dekk1-kjeden er en del av RAC Group, som også eier Maxxis- og Pirelliimportøren Gummi Centralen AS og Ferno Norden som bygger biler for Politi, Brann og Ambulansetjenesten, samt selger og importerer prehospital utstyr og varsellys. Dekk1 kjeden og merkenavnet ble startet med 14 butikker i Rogaland i 2007 og bygger på over 25 års bransje og produktkunnskap. Videre oppkjøp resulterte i sterk etablering i Hordaland i 2008, Vestfold i 2009 og området Oslo i 2010. Dekk1 har i løpet av kort tid etablert et moderne og levedyktig merkenavn, og opparbeidet en meget sterk markedsposisjon. Dekk1 er en uavhengig, ikke fabrikkeiet kjede, og fører alle de viktige merkevarene innen dekk og felg. Dekk1 har landets største utvalg både i sortiment og segment. Organisasjonen består ev medarbeidere med meget god markeds- og bransjekunnskap, dyktige ledere på mange nivå og god kremmerånd. Kjeden har topp moderne butikker og verksteder, og vi bestreber oss hele veien etter å ha bransjens dyktigste, mest profesjonelle og dedikerte ansatte. Dekk1 kjeden har hovedkontor på Lierstranda utenfor Drammen. Adresse: Teglverksveien 11B, 3413 Lier. Dekk1 leverer dekk og felg til: Person og varebil Last og anlegg Truck og industri Landbruk MC Mange av våre butikker har spesialkompetanse inne ett eller flere av disse områdene. Driver du egen dekkbutikk og ønsker å være en del av Norges ledende dekk-kjede? Vi søker nye medlemmer til vårt Dekk1 Partner-program: https://www.dekk1.no/dekk1-partner

Company description: Fundada en 1960, la empresa Kumho Tyre, con sede en Seúl, Corea del Sur, es uno de los fabricantes de neumáticos líderes a nivel mundial, con unos ingresos de dos mil millones de euros. Cada año vende más de 60 millones de neumáticos en todo el mundo. Con más de 10.000 empleados en todo el mundo, Kumho principalmente desarrolla, produce y comercializa neumáticos para turismos, furgonetas y camiones. Dispone de plantas de producción en Corea, China, Vietnam y Estados Unidos y centros de investigación y desarrollo en Corea, China, Europa y Norteamérica. También es proveedor oficial de Volkswagen, Mercedes-Benz, BMW, Fiat, Mini, Hyundai y Kia. Durante años, Kumho ha sido un importante patrocinador del fútbol europeo de alto nivel, y actualmente es el patrocinador oficial del equipo Tottenham Hotspur, de la Premier League, del Schalke 04, de la Bundesliga, y el Olympique de Lyon, de la Ligue 1. Name: Autobanden Donckers
Locations: [Belgium, Flanders, Sint-niklaas], [Belgium, Flanders, Stekene, 73 De Stropersstraat Kem, 9190], [Belgium, Flanders, Schoten, 905 Brechtsebaan, 2900]
Company description: Donckers is een van de grootste bandenspecialisten in België. In de regio groot-Antwerpen alleen, bieden we maar liefst 11 centrales aan, verspreid van het Waasland tot de Kempen. Donckers is gespecialiseerd in de vervanging en herstelling van personenwagen-, bestelwagen- en SUV- banden, alsook velgen, uitlijnen, vervanging van de remmen en schokdempers. Maar ook de kleinste kruiwagenband tot de grootste vrachtwagen-, land- of wegenbouw banden vallen binnen onze expertise. Donckers heeft een kwalitatief zeer hoogstaand en snel groeiend netwerk van maar liefst 32 vestigingen. De montageruimten zijn uitgerust met de allernieuwste elektronische apparatuur, om zo de beste kwaliteit en snelste service te waarborgen. In de vestiging te Schoten kunnen maar liefst 40 voertuigen gelijktijdig geserviced worden. Het is dan ook officieel de grootste bandencentrale van Europa! Donckers verdeelt alle gekende bandenmerken, en is exclusief nationaal verdeler voor General Tire en Mabor, beide geproduceerd in Europa door een van ’s werelds grootste fabrikanten. Verder bekwam Donckers in 2014 het nationale dealership van het Duitse velgenmerk RIAL, gekend voor uiterst gedegen kwaliteit en vakmanschap zoals met van volledig Europees geproduceerde goederen mag verwachten. In de vestigingen van Donckers treft U gemiddeld zo’n 6000 nieuwe banden uit voorraad aan, een stock die dagelijks aangevuld wordt vanuit het centraal magazijn, waar de filialen uit een voorraad van zo’n 200.000 beschikbare banden kunnen putten.

Company description: „Sostenos“ grupė – viena didžiausių lengvųjų automobilių prekybos ir remonto paslaugų įmonių Lietuvoje. Kompanija sėkmingai veiklą vykdo nuo 1992 metų ir nuolat plečia savo tinklą bei parduodamų automobilių asortimentą. „Sostena“ yra oficialus atestuotas „Volvo“, „Renault“, „Dacia“ ir „Lynk & Co“ atstovas Lietuvoje. „Sostenos“ atstovybės yra penkiuose didžiuosiuose Lietuvos miestuose – Vilniuje, Kaune, Klaipėdoje, Šiauliuose ir Panevėžyje. Įmonės naujienos, pasiekimai ir planai: •	Nuo 2025-ųjų tampa oficiali „Lynk & Co“ atstovė Lietuvoje. •	2022 metų pavasarį Vilniuje, Savanorių pr. 163, duris atvėrė dar vienas „Sostenos“ „Renault“ ir „Dacia“ automobilių centras – moderniausias Rytų Europoje bei įrengtas pagal naujausius gamintojo standartus.  •	„Sostena“ tapo geriausia 2020-ųjų „Renault“ automobilių atstovybe Baltijos šalyse. Apdovanojimą, kuris suteikiamas įvertinant pardavimo rodiklius ir aptarnavimo kokybę, įmonė atsiėmė jau trečią kartą. •	2016 m. gruodžio mėn. Vilniuje duris atvėrė atnaujintas „Volvo“ automobilių centras, įrengtas pagal moderniausią gamintojo strategiją. Ji apima ne tik patogią, jaukią, skandinaviška dvasia alsuojančią aplinką, bet pirmiausia naują klientų aptarnavimo standartą. Be novatoriškų dizaino ir technologinių sprendimų įdiegtos ir dvi efektyvios, į klientus orientuotos „Volvo“ aptarnavimo programos – VRE (angl. „Volvo“ Retail Experience – „Volvo“ salono patirtis) ir VPS (angl. „Volvo“ Personal Service – „Volvo“ asmeninis aptarnavimas). Į tokį atsinaujinimą „Sostenos“ grupė investavo daugiau nei milijoną eurų, o Lietuva tapo pirmąja Baltijos šalimi, kurioje įkurtas tokio lygio „Volvo“ automobilių centras. •	Iki 2021 m. pabaigos atsinaujino „Sostenos“ automobilių centrai Klaipėdoje, Kaune ir Šiauliuose – juose įdiegti naujausi standartai ir teikiamos pasaulinio lygio paslaugos. •	„Sostenos“ grupė ir toliau tęs veiklos transformaciją, siūlys dar daugiau naujovių ir paslaugų savo klientams bei investuos į plėtrą.

Name: Tiremaster
Company description: A Tiremaster é uma oficina especialista em pneus e mecânica rápida pertencente ao Grupo automotivo Louzan.  Louzan é uma rede de oficinas que nasceram nos anos 40 de uma empresa familiar dedicada à atividade recauchutadora e, com o passar do tempo evoluiu e adaptou-se devido às necessidades do mercado e dos seus consumidores. Atualmente conta com 9 oficinas distribuídas por dois países vizinhos, uma oficina em Portugal e 8 oficinas em Espanha. Foi em 2010 que o Grupo Louzan adquiriu a antiga Bompneu, atual Tiremaster, situada em Leça da Palmeira, Porto. Tiremaster é especialista em pneus e mecânica rápida que passou a integrar no Grupo Louzan, a Tiremaster herdou a sua filosofia de trabalho, com quem comparte a sua honestidade, seriedade e compromisso com a qualidade que caracterizam a sua empresa, uma rede de referência no setor em Espanha. A sua segurança é a nossa prioridade e nós demonstramos isso em todos os nossos serviços na qualidade a bom preço, sendo esta a nossa máxima.

La experiencia de todos estos años nos han dado el conocimiento que nos garantiza el liderazgo en el mercado canario. Estamos presente en la isla de Tenerife, Gran Canaria, Fuerteventura y Lanzarote.

Company description: TAE heeft reeds meer als 45 jaar ervaring in import, distributie, installatie en onderhoud van garage-uitrusting in België. Onze belangrijkste doelstelling is het leveren van een kwalitatief hoogstaande service. Samen met de klant maken onze technische adviseurs een grondige analyse en voeren advies gericht op elke specifieke situatie. Ongeacht de activiteit binnen de automobielsector, TAE heeft de oplossing op maat. Zo verzorgen wij de inrichting van elke automobiel werkplaats van A tot Z. Met onze specifieke, hoogtechnologische en ergonomische apparatuur, beloven we een snelle en efficiënte workflow die steeds mee is met de laatste nieuwe technologie. TAE neemt elke afdeling van het bedrijf onder de loep om het maximale uit uw activiteiten te halen. Onze kwaliteitsgarantie vertaalt zich in een boeiende en succesvolle partnership van topmerken. Zo zijn wij exclusieve verdeler van MAHA, HUNTER, ROBINAIR, JAB en vele andere. De Technische Keuring geeft ons al meer dan 35 jaar het vertrouwen dankzij onze efficiënte en betrouwbaarheid. Ook het vertrouwen en mandaat binnen de transport en truckwereld, waar veiligheid, efficiëntie en ergonomie hoofdpijlers zijn, nemen wij ter harte. Ons door de overheid erkend opleiding center wordt sinds jaren door vele auto en banden constructeurs gebruikt voor de theoretische en praktische opleidingen in automobieltechnieken zoals wieluitlijning en air conditioning. Een team van 50 ervaren technici opgeleid per specialisatie, garanderen een deskundig advies, efficiënte plaatsing, scholing en onderhoud van uw uitrusting.

Company description: La storia che segue mostra come, in più di cinquant'anni, PALMERI sia partita da Misterbianco, piccolo comune del sud Italia, per diventare un nome di spicco nella vendita all'ingrosso di pneumatici in Sicilia, Calabria e Basilicata. La storia di PALMERI comincia nel 1962, anno di nascita della Superior, industria specializzata nella ricostruzione pneumatici. Qualche anno dopo, l'azienda, grazie ad una idea di Emilio Palmeri inizia a commercializzare pneumatici nuovi; iniziando a diventare un punto di riferimento per la Sicilia orientale. Una grande svolta si ha nel momento in cui Michelin decide di creare il sistema di diffusione organizzata per il loro marchio. Ci vantiamo di essere tra i primi che iniziarono la partnership con Michelin per la distribuzione dei pneumatici.

Company description: Flinkenberg is a long-standing expert in the field of lifting technology, serving as the importer and technical consultant for J.D. Neuhaus, a renowned manufacturer of pneumatic hoists since 1745. The company specializes in providing high-quality lifting solutions, including the JDN Mini and JDN Profi series, which are designed for demanding industrial environments such as automotive, machine shops, and metal industries. Flinkenberg's mission is to meet diverse lifting needs with innovative, reliable, and cost-effective products that ensure safety and efficiency, particularly in potentially hazardous areas. Their target market includes industries that require robust lifting solutions, and they collaborate closely with clients to tailor their offerings to specific operational requirements. With a commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction, Flinkenberg aims to be a trusted partner in lifting technology.

Company description: Ad Alessandria, Tortona e Casale Monferrato.  Siamo concessionaria BMW, MINI, BMW Motorrad, Sportequipe, Mitsubishi, KGM e Microlino. Tanti i servizi e le attenzioni che siamo in grado di offrire, grazie all’esperienza maturata negli anni.  Oltre alla vendita di auto nuove, disponiamo di una vasta scelta di vetture USATE, KM0 e AZIENDALI, auto per NEOPATENTATI e officina dedicata. Tutto il nostro impegno è riversato nella cura e nell'attenzione del cliente, ogni nostra azione è concepita per riuscire ad offrire una customer experience senza precedenti.  > CENTRO REVISIONI Tra i altri servizi che l’officina meccanica di Rolandi Auto può offrire c’è anche il CENTRO REVISIONI per auto. I nostri meccanici svolgono questo servizio da molti anni garantendo tempi veloci e massima accuratezza. > PNEUMATICI Le nostre officine meccaniche ad Alessandria, Tortona e Casale Monferrato sono in grado di consigliare lo pneumatico giusto per ogni vettura. È possibile verificare il livello di usura del battistrada e acquistarne un treno nuovo delle migliori marche a prezzi convenienti; è possibile, inoltre, riparare da noi lo pneumatico sgonfio o bucato usufruendo dei nostri servizi rapidi che permettono di rivolgersi ai meccanici anche senza appuntamento. > TAGLIANDO AUTO Come la revisione, anche il tagliando auto si occupa di controllare lo stato di usura delle componenti dell’auto per poterne garantire la sicurezza e le performance.  Le parti dell’auto che verranno verificate dai nostri meccanici sono: - controllo e sostituzione dei fluidi quali olio, liquido freni, detergente e refrigerante - pulizia dei filtri - verifica e riparazione delle luci esterne ed interne - riparazione dei cristalli - controllo dell’usura dei pneumatici ed eventuale cambio gomme - controllo del sistema frenante - controllo del corretto funzionamento del condizionatore

Company description: Im Jahr 2000 war es der berühmte Zufall, der den heutigen Firmeninhaber, Herrn Thomas Rumpf, erstmals mit der Reifenbranche bekannt machte. Nebenberuflich beschäftigte sich dieser zunächst von zu Hause damit, nach zuverlässigen Einkaufsquellen für Markenreifen zu suchen. Sehr schnell waren die ersten Geschäftsräume in Kassel gefunden und der erste Mitarbeiter hat sein 15-jähriges Dienstjubiläum bereits lange hinter sich.Ein stetiges Wachstum führte im Jahr 2009 zur Gründung der Reifenvertrieb24 GmbH, deren einziger Gesellschafter unser Firmengründer bis heute ist. Als einer der führenden Großhandelsvermarkter für Stahlräder in Deutschland halten wir an unserem Lager weit über 200.000 Reifen und Felgen bereit. Diese liefern wir mit eigenem Fuhrpark und mit Hilfe der Paketdienste an unsere zahlreichen, nationalen und internationalen Groß- und Einzelhandelskunden. Hierzu zählen Autohäuser, Werkstätten und Reifenhändler. Genauso gehört zu unseren Kunden der private Endkunde. Die Reifenvertrieb24 GmbH steht für höchste Kundenorientierung, leistungsfähige Preise und ein breites Produktportfolio und ist einer der erfolgreichen Reifen- und Felgenhändler in Deutschland. https://reifenvertrieb24.de/impressum

Company description: SOMOS UM FORNECEDOR GLOBAL DE SOLUÇÕES PARA OS NOSSOS CLIENTES. Iniciámos a atividade há 14 anos e somos uma empresa reconhecida e empenhada em fornecer as melhores soluções para os nossos clientes. Líderes nacionais na disponibilidade de stock, capacidade de resposta, competitividade dos preços e na inovação tecnológica das ferramentas que disponibilizamos aos nossos parceiros.	 As nossas instalações, sediadas no Polo Logístico e Industrial de Arazede, Montemor-o-Velho, contam com 13.000 m2 de armazém e 700 m2 de área administrativa. Mais de 5500 referências de pneus com 99% de cobertura na gama de marcas premium e mais de 30 000 referências em peças auto com uma cobertura de, no mínimo 80% do parque automóvel. Somos especialistas na distribuição aftermarket a nível Ibérico.  Disponibilizamos aos nossos clientes um portal B2B intuitivo, uma app de pedidos para smartphones gratuita, onde pode em apenas 3 cliques efetuar encomendas de peças e pneus e uma equipa de customer care altamente especializada.	 A nossa missão é disponibilizar um serviço de altíssima qualidade aos nossos clientes, ajudando-os a crescer. Junte-se a nós e confie nas nossas competências para gerir as suas necessidades.

Company description: VI HOLDER DIT VÆRKSTED I TOPFORM! Hos FLEX1ONE har vi specialiseret os i at forsyne de danske dæk- og autoværksteder med autolifte, maskiner samt værksteds- og lagerinventar. Vores sortiment består både af produkter, som vi importerer – og af produkter, som vi selv udvikler og producerer. Vores egenproduktion kendes under brandet AHCON, som har eksisteret i knap 50 år. SHOWROOM I Brørup har vi indrettet 400 m2 med et bredt udsnit af vores udstyr. Her vejleder og rådgiver vi vores kunder forud for nye investeringer – og sikrer, at det er de rette produkter, der investeres i. TEGNESTUE Både i forbindelse med salg af udstyr til dæk- og autoværksteder samt af inventarløsninger, tilbyder FLEX1ONE opmåling samt udarbejdelse af tekniske tegninger på egen tegnestue. Vi har bred erfaring med, hvordan man får det optimale ud af værkstedets kvadratmetre – og ikke mindst, hvordan udstyret bedst kan placeres. Sluttelig ved vi, hvordan man udnytter et lagerlokale bedst muligt. SERVICE- OG SIKKERHEDSEFTERSYN Udover salgsaktiviteterne udfører vi også service- og sikkerhedsydelser på autolifte, dækmaskiner og andet udstyr. Tegn en aftale med os om, at vi udfører service- og sikkerhedseftersyn på årlig basis – og slip dermed for selv at skulle huske at planlægge de lovpligtige eftersyn. KONTAKT OS Vores interne salgsafdeling kan kontaktes på telefon 76 15 25 00 – vi hjælper dig hurtigt med en afklaring af spørgsmål og et tilbud på nyt udstyr.

Name: Grafschafter Autozentrale Heinrich Krüp GmbH
Locations: [Germany, Lower Saxony, Nordhorn, 243-245 Bentheimer Straße, 48529], [Germany, Lower Saxony, Emlichheim, 51 Ringer Straße, 49824]
HQ Location: Germany, Lower Saxony, Nordhorn, 243-245 Bentheimer Straße, 48529
Technologies: WhatsApp Business Chat, Google Font API, MobX, Vue.js, Bootstrap, Modernizr, PHP, Google Fonts API, X-Content-Type-Options, Piwik PRO Core, Apache HTTP Server, TYPO3, Symfony, Open Graph, PWA, X-UA-Compatible, jQuery, Apache, Google Tag Manager, Font Awesome, Shopware, MySQL, WhatsApp Business, Matomo
Company description: Die Grafschafter Autozentrale wurde im November 1952 von Josef Fickers in Nordhorn gegründet.  Ein zweites Autohaus in Emlichheim entstand 1967. Von nun an verkauften, warteten und reparierten wir Fahrzeuge der Marken Volkswagen, VW Nutzfahrzeuge und Audi sowie Gebrauchtwagen aller Marken an zwei Standorten in der Grafschaft Bentheim. 1994 wurde der Emlichheimer Betrieb aufgrund von Standortproblemen an der Ringer Straße neu geplant und gebaut. Nach dem plötzlichen Tod des Seniorchefs, Heinrich Krüp, im November 1997, übernahmen seine Söhne Helmut und Michael Krüp die Geschäftsführung und traten als alleinige Gesellschafter ein. Im August 1999 bautenh wir an der Bentheimer Straße einen neuen Betrieb. Jeweils ein eigener Showroom für die Marken Audi und VW entstanden. Der Service- und Werkstattbereich wurde in einer Einheit für alle Marken errichtet. Im Jahre 2007 bauten wir den Reifeneinlagerungsservice für unsere Kunden aus. Wir haben nun Platz für 1.200 Satz Reifen. Zudem bauten wir im Jahr 2012 eine weiter Halle für den Servicebereich. Seit der Käfer- und Transporter-Ära wuchs unser Autohaus aus kleinsten Anfängen zu einem dynamischen mittelständischen Unternehmen. Heute beschäftigen wir über 80 Mitarbeiter in Vollzeit und Teilzeit. Davon sind 10% Auszubildende im kaufmännischen sowie im technischen Bereich. Junge Menschen für die Automobilbranche auszubilden war für uns schon immer ein wichtiges Unternehmensziel. Damit Sie sich jederzeit bei uns wohl fühlen, sind unsere Öffnungszeiten kundenfreundlich und wir bieten einen Hol- und Bringservice für Ihr Fahrzeug. Ein 24-Stunden Notdienst hilft Ihnen rund um die Uhr bei Pannen. Damit Sie mobil bleiben, stehen Kundenersatzfahrzeuge der Euromobil Autovermietung bereit. Wir bieten Ihnen das komplette Dienstleistungsangebot von Finanzierungen, Leasing und Kraftfahrzeugversicherung über die Herstellerbanken an.

Name: Schmitter Hydraulik GmbH
Technologies: Twitter Emoji (Twemoji), Google Font API, Revslider, Meister, Google Tag Manager, WPML, Chart.js, Yoast SEO, Slider Revolution, Choices, CloudFlare, reCAPTCHA, Google Analytics, Font Awesome, Apache, Cloudflare Bot Management, jQuery, core-js, Lightbox, oEmbed, jQuery Migrate, Shortcodes Ultimate, MySQL, Cart Functionality, PHP, Google Fonts API, All in One SEO, Fusion Ads, Twemoji, Modernizr, Lodash, Contact Form 7, Bootstrap, Babel, WordPress Super Cache, Cookiebot, JSON-LD, WordPress, Priority Hints, RSS, Open Graph, ReCaptcha v2 for Contact Form 7, MonsterInsights, Apache HTTP Server, Shopify
Company description: Hydraulics with heart, hand & passion - that is Schmitter Hydraulik. As a technical wholesale company, we started out in connection technology. We are now one of the leading German distributors of hydraulic and pneumatic solutions of all kinds - from classic screw connections to complex power units. From Hammelburg, where our headquarter is located, we distribute our products to various countries in Europe and beyond. But our responsibility does not end with product sales - this is where it begins. Our philosophy is service- and customer-orientated: If you have any questions, concerns or suggestions about your Schmitter product, we are there to help and work with you to find solutions. Our large, international customer service team and a large number of sales representatives are on hand to ensure that everything runs smoothly. Our technical sales team will also enable you to solve problems independently: an intensive training and workshop programme will make you fit to work independently with and on hydraulic systems.  As an employer, we are committed to the values of appreciation, transparency and community. We know that all our employees - each and every one of them - makes an important contribution to our day-to-day operations and we always endeavour to show this. Genuine benefits such as holiday and Christmas bonuses, bonus payments and a monthly company breakfast are therefore an integral part of our corporate DNA.

Company description: Midas España es una empresa especializada en el mantenimiento y reparación de vehículos, ofreciendo una amplia gama de servicios que incluyen revisiones oficiales, diagnósticos de seguridad, mantenimiento de climatización, y cambio de neumáticos, entre otros. Su misión es proporcionar un servicio de alta calidad y confianza, asegurando la seguridad y el correcto funcionamiento de los vehículos de sus clientes. Midas se enfoca en un mercado diverso que abarca tanto vehículos particulares como flotas de empresas, estableciendo relaciones a largo plazo con sus clientes y socios. Además, la compañía promueve iniciativas como "EllasConducen" para empoderar a las mujeres en el ámbito automotriz. Con un compromiso hacia la innovación y la satisfacción del cliente, Midas España se posiciona como un referente en el sector del mantenimiento automotriz.

Somit finden Sie bei uns garantiert Ihr richtiges Fahrzeug und den passenden Rundum-Service. Seit 2020 verkaufen wir auch Wohnmobile der Marken Bürstner und Sunlight.
